title: Pheno4D: A spatio-temporal dataset of maize and tomato ...
summary: This article introduces Pheno4D, a spatio-temporal dataset for maize and tomato, which can be processed with point cloud software. It focuses on the dataset itself and its processing.
usefulness_reason: Score 65 assigned because the article directly mentions 'spatio-temporal dataset', which is relevant to 'Spatio Temporal' and 'Contextual dataset'. However, 'point cloud processing' is not directly related to 'Point Process' in the statistical sense.
